msg: Application startup failed due to DNS resolution failure

details.error: Could not establish connection to backend service.
details.stackTrace:
java.net.UnknownHostException: payment-gateway.internal.opsflow.local: Temporary failure in name resolution
    at java.net.Inet4AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
    at java.net.InetAddress$2.lookupAllHostAddr(InetAddress.java:928)
